#Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```
#Load datasets
```{r}
movies_data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/khushisatra/Final-Project/refs/heads/main/movies.csv")

movies_data
view(movies_data)
```
#Step 1: Tidying 
```{r}
movies_data_year_country <- movies_data |>
  mutate(released_date = str_extract(released, "^[A-Za-z]+ \\d{1,2}, \\d{4}")) |>
  select(-released, -year) 
movies_data_year_country

```
